scripts.ii: npm i && npm i --prefix client && npm i --prefix server
scripts.dev: concurrently "cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=development npm run start --prefix client" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development PORT=3001 npm run dev --prefix server"
scripts.build: cross-env REACT_APP_ENV=production npm run build --prefix client && cpy "client/build/**" "build/" --overwrite && rimraf client/build
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test PORT=3000 npm run dev --prefix server
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=production PORT=3000 npm run start --prefix server
